hero.name: Ayush Katiyar
hero.title: Frontend Developer
hero.content: I am a passionate Software Engineer with over 2+ years of expertise in crafting advanced user interfaces. Proficient in responsive UI design, I have a strong foundation in frontend frameworks and technologies. My goal is to leverage my skills in creating seamless user experiences and drive innovation in web development.

about.heading: About Me
about.content: I am a dedicated Software Engineer with a focus on frontend development. With over 2+ years of professional experience, I have honed my skills in creating advanced, responsive user interfaces. My expertise spans across various frontend frameworks and technologies, allowing me to craft seamless user experiences. I am particularly skilled in microfront-end architecture, performance optimization, and full-stack development. My journey in software engineering is driven by a passion for innovation and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions that enhance user interaction and drive business growth.

content.description: Led implementation of microfront-end architecture, improved app performance, and spearheaded Flutter-based mobile app development. Implemented Google OAuth, reCaptcha, and Firebase Cloud Messaging.
Designed and developed end-to-end solutions using Vue.js and Spring. Contributed to and maintained internal libraries, and mentored offshore team in Vue.js implementation.
Designed responsive web applications using React and SASS. Streamlined development process by creating mock APIs and integrating with REST APIs.
Developed a full-stack finance report generation application. Worked with various technologies to create comprehensive solutions.

content.title: AD GENERATIVE TOOL
content.description: Developed an AI-powered tool for generating ad campaigns and logo designs, reducing ad creation time by 70% and increasing campaign effectiveness by 40%.

content.title: NEXT BIZONGO PLATFORM
content.description: Architected and implemented the core structure for a new e-commerce platform, utilizing microfront-end architecture to improve scalability and reduce time-to-market by 50%.

content.title: SYMPHONY RETAIL AI SOLUTIONS
content.description: Designed and developed end-to-end solutions using Vue.js and Spring, improving system efficiency by 35%.

content.title: iPromoteU Web Applications
content.description: Designed responsive web applications using React and SASS, improving cross-platform compatibility by 60%.
